page.title: 03Farming - Todwick.
page.content: {Farming}is an important industry around Todwick and there are nine farms in use in our area.All of these farmers could own a considerable amount of land,while others own just a few acres.All these farmers mainly grow{cereal crops}like wheat and barley and oil seed rape.These farmers use tractors to pull trailers and ploughs.Combine harvesters are used to {harvest}the crops.They use barns to store the hay and straw.Farming affects the{landscape}in our area.In autumn ploughing begins and the land is turned over showing the soil as a reddish colour.In spring green shoots appear through the earth and in summer the crops are golden ready for harvesting in July or August.
